name: CLICKUP__AUTHORIZED_WORKSPACES
description: View the Workspaces available to the authenticated user.

name: CLICKUP__DOCS_SEARCH
description: View the Docs in your Workspace. You can only view information of Docs you can access.

workspaceId.description: The ID of the workspace to search docs in.

id.description: Filter results to a single Doc with the given Doc ID.

creator.description: Filter results to Docs created by the user with the given user ID.

deleted.description: Filter results to return deleted Docs.

archived.description: Filter results to return archived Docs.

parent_id.description: Filter results to children of a parent Doc with the given parent Doc ID.

parent_type.description: Filter results to children of the given parent Doc type. For example, SPACE, FOLDER, LIST, EVERYTHING, WORKSPACE.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve for each page.

next_cursor.description: The cursor to use to get the next page of results.

name: CLICKUP__GOALS_GET
description: View the Goals available in a Workspace.

include_completed.description: Whether to include completed goals in the results.

name: CLICKUP__WORKSPACE_SEATS_GET
description: View the used, total, and available member and guest seats for a Workspace.

name: CLICKUP__SPACES_GET
description: View the Spaces available in a Workspace. You can only get member info in private Spaces.

archived.description: Filter results to return archived Spaces.

name: CLICKUP__TASKS
description: Get tasks from a list, folder, or space with filtering and pagination options.

list_id.description: List ID to get tasks from

name: CLICKUP__CREATE_TASK
description: Create a new task in a list with title, description, assignees, and due date.

list_id.description: List ID to create task in

assignees.description: Array of user IDs to assign

name: CLICKUP__UPDATE_TASK
description: Update an existing task with new information, status, assignees, or due dates.

add.description: User IDs to add as assignees

rem.description: User IDs to remove as assignees

name: CLICKUP__TASK_GET_TASK
description: Retrieve a specific task by its ID with full details including subtasks and comments.

team_id.description: Only used when custom_task_ids is true

name: CLICKUP__TASK_DELETE_TASK
description: Delete a task by its ID from ClickUp workspace.

name: CLICKUP__CREATE_TASK_COMMENT
description: Add a comment to a task for team collaboration and communication.

assignee.description: User ID to assign with the comment

name: CLICKUP__LISTS
description: Get all lists in a folder with their task counts and settings.

folder_id.description: Folder ID to get lists from

name: CLICKUP__CREATE_LIST
description: Create a new list in a folder for organizing tasks and projects.

folder_id.description: Folder ID to create list in

due_date.description: Due date timestamp for the list

assignee.description: User ID to assign list to

name: CLICKUP__FOLDERS
description: Get all folders in a space with their lists and task organization.

space_id.description: Space ID to get folders from

name: CLICKUP__CREATE_FOLDER
description: Create a new folder in a space for organizing lists and projects with hierarchical structure.

space_id.description: Space ID to create folder in

name: CLICKUP__TIME_TRACKING
description: Retrieve time tracking entries for tasks, users, or projects with detailed time logs and productivity analytics.

team_id.description: Team ID to get time entries for

name: CLICKUP__CREATE_TIME_ENTRY
description: Log time for a specific task or project to track productivity and billable hours for project management.

team_id.description: Team ID to log time for

tid.description: Task ID to log time against

name: CLICKUP__TASK_COMMENTS
description: Retrieve all comments on a specific task for collaboration tracking and communication history.

task_id.description: Task ID to get comments for

team_id.description: Team ID when using custom task IDs

name: CLICKUP__CUSTOM_FIELDS
description: Retrieve custom fields configuration for a list to understand available data fields and their types.

list_id.description: List ID to get custom fields for

name: CLICKUP__TEAM_MEMBERS
description: Retrieve all team members in a workspace with their roles, permissions, and activity status for team management.

team_id.description: Team ID to get members for

name: CLICKUP__CREATE_GOAL
description: Create a new goal with targets, deadlines, and key results for objective tracking and team alignment.

team_id.description: Team ID to create goal in

owners.description: Array of user IDs as goal owners

name: CLICKUP__WEBHOOKS
description: List all configured webhooks for real-time notifications about task updates, project changes, and team activities.

team_id.description: Team ID to get webhooks for

name: CLICKUP__CREATE_WEBHOOK
description: Create a webhook to receive real-time notifications for task updates, status changes, and project events for external system integration.

team_id.description: Team ID to create webhook for

name: CLICKUP__TASK_ATTACHMENTS
description: Retrieve all file attachments for a specific task including documents, images, and other uploaded files.

task_id.description: Task ID to get attachments for

name: CLICKUP__CREATE_TASK_ATTACHMENT
description: Upload a file attachment to a task for document sharing and collaboration within project context.

task_id.description: Task ID to attach file to

name: CLICKUP__TASK_TEMPLATES
description: Retrieve available task templates for standardized task creation and workflow automation across projects.

team_id.description: Team ID to get task templates for

name: CLICKUP__TASK_DEPENDENCIES
description: Retrieve task dependencies and blocking relationships for project scheduling and workflow management.

task_id.description: Task ID to get dependencies for

name: CLICKUP__CREATE_TASK_DEPENDENCY
description: Create task dependencies to establish workflow order and project scheduling constraints for effective project management.

task_id.description: Task ID to create dependency for

depends_on.description: Task ID that this task depends on

dependency_of.description: Task ID that depends on this task

name: CLICKUP__AUTOMATIONS
description: Retrieve all automation rules configured in the workspace for workflow automation and productivity enhancement.

team_id.description: Team ID to get automations for

name: CLICKUP__WORKSPACE_ANALYTICS
description: Retrieve comprehensive workspace analytics including productivity metrics, task completion rates, and team performance data for strategic insights.

team_id.description: Team ID to get analytics for

start_date.description: Start date for analytics period (Unix timestamp)

end_date.description: End date for analytics period (Unix timestamp)
